name: Hai-Shin 2
overview: Hai-Shin 2 is the sequel to the Playstation game Pro Logic Mahjong Hai Shin and is also mahjong game with different game modes: - Special Play (free mode) - Mahjong Grand Prix (story mode: Mahjong championship of 1998) - Basic Study (Mahjong guide & dictionary) - Mahjong Hands (practical tutorial) - Tempai Mahjong (play tempai mahjong with his guide)
